ENABLED.name: enabled
ENABLED.comment: Enable or disable VintageShock haptic feedback

ON_PLAYER_DEATH.name: on-player-death
ON_PLAYER_DEATH.comment: Trigger shock when the player dies

ON_PLAYER_DAMAGE.name: on-player-damage
ON_PLAYER_DAMAGE.comment: Trigger shock when the player takes damage

ON_PLAYER_HURT_OTHER.name: on-player-hurt-other
ON_PLAYER_HURT_OTHER.comment: Trigger shock when the player hurts another entity

ENABLE_POWER_RAMPING.name: enable-power-ramping
ENABLE_POWER_RAMPING.comment: Ramp shock intensity up/down over time

ENABLE_DURATION_RAMPING.name: enable-duration-ramping
ENABLE_DURATION_RAMPING.comment: Ramp shock duration up/down over time

DEBUG_MODE.name: debug-mode
DEBUG_MODE.comment: Enable extra VintageShock debug logging to chat

DEVICE_ID.name: device-id
DEVICE_ID.comment: The ID of your haptic device on OpenShock

DURATION_SEC.name: duration-sec
DURATION_SEC.comment: Duration of the shock in seconds (5-65)

POWER_RAMP_STEP_PERCENT.name: power-ramp-step-percent
POWER_RAMP_STEP_PERCENT.comment: Percent of remaining intensity gap added per shock

POWER_RAMP_DOWN_PERCENT.name: power-ramp-down-percent
POWER_RAMP_DOWN_PERCENT.comment: Percent intensity decayed each interval after ramp-up

POWER_RAMP_DOWN_INTERVAL_SEC.name: power-ramp-down-interval-sec
POWER_RAMP_DOWN_INTERVAL_SEC.comment: Interval in seconds between intensity decay steps

DURATION_RAMP_STEP_PERCENT.name: duration-ramp-step-percent
DURATION_RAMP_STEP_PERCENT.comment: Percent of remaining duration gap added per shock

DURATION_RAMP_DOWN_PERCENT.name: duration-ramp-down-percent
DURATION_RAMP_DOWN_PERCENT.comment: Percent duration decayed each interval after ramp-up

DURATION_RAMP_DOWN_INTERVAL_SEC.name: duration-ramp-down-interval-sec
DURATION_RAMP_DOWN_INTERVAL_SEC.comment: Interval in seconds between duration decay steps
